name: BUMP! Superbrawl
summary: BUMP! Superbrawl is a 1V1 action strategy game set in a fantastical Utopia. Join an all-new competition with mythical heroes from around the world and become the ULTIMATE CHAMPION! Face off other players in action-packed strategic battles, test your skills in a variety of competitive game modes, switch up your tactics to master new challenges and climb your way up through the leaderboard!
